text.section: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, functions not specifically allocated in this subtitle shall be assigned to the Commission or to one or both of the county planning boards, as needed.

The assignments shall:
be made by resolution of the Commission with the approval of the respective county council; and
carry out the policy that local or intracounty planning functions should be performed by the county planning boards.
